content.rendered:
Pearl Villas, Airport Road, Uyo, Akwa Ibom

Pearl Villas Uyo is strategically located along Airport Road. The estate is in a tranquil and secure setting, and you can buy and build right away.

Pearl Villas Uyo is centrally situated to provide investors with easy access to the state’s major tourist attractions. Beach resorts, hotels, and coastal regions are among them.

The estate is completely free of government encumbrances and is completely dry, and it ensures a high rate of return on investment.

LANDMARK

  • Victor Attah International Airport
  • Southern Atlantic Polytechnic
  • Route to Ibaka Deep Sea Port
  • Peace Roundabout

PROXIMITY: 5 mins from Airport

TOPOGRAPHY: Pearl Villas, Uyo is 100% dry

DOCUMENT TITLE

  • Survey & Deed of Assignment (Free from Govt Encumbrances).
  • Also comes with a Government Approved Layout.

COORDINATES: 394337.235mE, 541398.344mN

ESTATE FEATURES

  • Fenced and gated estate
  • A serene and secured environment
  • Genuine, affordable, and accessible
  • Located along the major road
  • It is a buy and builds land o Instant plot allocation

PRICE:

  • OUTRIGHT: ₦1, 500,000.00
  • 12 MONTHS: ₦2, 040,000.00

VIDEOS:
